title: wine_Brancott_2010_Chosen_Rows_Sauvignon_Blanc_(Marlborough)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 49946.
country: New Zealand.
description: It's taken New Zealand's largest producer a while to get on board the barrel-fermented express, and this wine is still only 50% done in wood, mainly large formats. Some funky, slightly acrid notes mark the nose, but this adds welcome complexity to the stone-fruit aromas. It's rich and textural in the mouth, the ripe fruit marked by intriguing hints of green herbs and spice before drawing to a long, elegant finish..
designation: Chosen Rows.
points: 93.
price: 50.0.
province: Marlborough.
